ovdesc.p: This is a system maintained concatenated file keyed on Account-Date with a list of Statement Ids with a future exposure date.

desc.p: It is the Id of the Stmt.entry with a future exposure and account as per the key.
The key to this file is Account-Date showing the Account Id and the future exposure date of the Stmt.entries for that account.
The key to this file is Account-Date showing the Account Id and the future exposure date of the Stmt.entries for that account.
The key to this file is Account-Date showing the Account Id and the future exposure date of the Stmt.entries for that account.
